definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]

sentences.english: Females are significantly larger than males.
sentences.chinese: 雌性绿森蚺要较雄性更大一些。

sentences.english: Some boas have many scars on the tail from this tactic.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种策略，很多蚺的尾巴上都有伤痕。

sentences.english: Anacondas kill by constricting the prey until it can no longer breathe and swallow the prey whole, head first.
sentences.chinese: 森蚺会先把猎物缠死，然后从头开始整个吞食下去。

sentences.english: However, boa constrictors have never been known to attack humans, the authors said.
sentences.chinese: 然而，作者表示据目前所知，红尾蚺从不攻击人类。

sentences.english: Caging for Amazon Tree Boas has a few specific requirements.
sentences.chinese: 亚马逊树蚺的蛇箱有一些特别的要求。

sentences.english: Because of their small, newborn stature, many Anaconda babies are prey for other animals.
sentences.chinese: 因为个体的原因，许多水蚺宝宝都会被别的动物捕食。

sentences.english: An albino Burmese python on display in Kuala Lumpur.
sentences.chinese: 一条缅甸蚺蟒白子在吉隆坡展出。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
